text: The first early - induced peak was transient and likely corresponds to the well documented typical <extra_id_0> junB <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA , stimulated in response to numerous growth factors , including <extra_id_0> IL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
